title: Modern Diamond Vaali (Earring)
features: Delicate double hoop design with alternating floral and diamond accents. The diamonds are pave-set for maximum brilliance. Features a secure click-post closure, ensuring comfortable and worry-free wear.
colors: Warm yellow gold contrasted with the bright sparkle of white diamonds.
occasions: parties and even a contemporary Mehendi.
description: This contemporary take on a traditional design offers a modern and versatile piece. The double hoop adds dimension and visual interest, while the sparkling diamonds and gold catch the light beautifully. Perfect to pair with any outfit.
